name: Avoid artifacts not checking the ending comments on Methods and Functions (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all Methods and Functions having comments that are not terminated correctly i.e. without an //end comment.
output:
"This report lists all Methods and Functions having comments that are not terminated correctly.

This QR provides the following information:
Method and Function full name."
rationale: Source code comments must be terminated correctly in order to be valid.
remediation: Review the comments for all the Methods and Functions in the source code and ensure they are always terminated correctly.
